org.jgum.category

Class CategoryProperty<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgum.category.CategoryProperty<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - 

    public class CategoryProperty<T>
extends Object
    The property of a category. A category property value depends on the location of the category in a categorization. If it does not explicitly set a property, its value will be looked up in its ancestor categories.
    Author:
    sergioc

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CategoryProperty(Category category, Object property)
      Resolves a given property according to the default bottom-up linearization function.

      Resolves a given property according to a given bottom-up linearization function.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CategoryProperty

        public CategoryProperty(Category category,
                Object property)
        Resolves a given property according to the default bottom-up linearization function.
        Parameters:
        category - the category where a property is queried.
        property - the property name to query.

      • CategoryProperty

        public CategoryProperty(Category category,
                Object property,
                com.google.common.base.Function<Category,List<Category>> linearizationFunction)
        Resolves a given property according to a given bottom-up linearization function.
        Parameters:
        category - the category where a property is queried.
        property - the property name to query.
        linearizationFunction - the bottom-up linearization function that will be used to find the property value.

        public Object getName()
        Returns:
        the name of the property.

      • isPresent

        public boolean isPresent()
        Returns:
        true if the property is present. false otherwise.

      • get

        public T get()
        Returns:
        the value of a property in a category. If the property is not set it will throw an exception.

      • set

        public void set(T value)
        Sets the value of the property in the wrapped category.
        Parameters:
        value - the value of the property.
